name: PUT book with non-existing ID should return 404

statusDetails.message: Expected an error response (e.g. 400 or 404) when updating book with ID 99999, but received a successful or empty response instead. Actual status code 200 and raw body: {"id":99999,"title":"Everything is Illuminated","description":"Doloribus beatae deleniti rerum vel neque velit tenetur eligendi et aperiam est.","pageCount":584,"excerpt":"Eveniet dolor in molestiae. Qui atque aut. Delectus et ut placeat rerum porro et.","publishDate":"2011-05-02T09:41:16Z"}
